gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.interfce

Class GaiaInputController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.InputAdapter
      • com.badlogic.gdx.input.GestureDetector
        • gaia.cu9.ari.gaiaorbit.interfce.GaiaInputController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor

    public class GaiaInputController
extends com.badlogic.gdx.input.GestureDetector
    Ripoff of libgdx's CameraInputController, for now.
    Author:
    Toni Sagrista
